name: Affogato AI
long_description:
Affogato is Cursor for short videos—an AI copilot that turns your ideas into ready-to-publish videos for TikTok, Instagram, and more.
Just describe what you want, and Affogato handles the rest—scripts, voices, visuals, scenes, and edits—no timelines, no tools, no learning curve. Whether you’re marketing a product, telling a story, or just posting for fun, Affogato helps you create scroll-stopping content in minutes.
one_liner: Affogato is Cursor for short videos
